DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate motivational interviewing session aim motivate recently discharge patient either chronic obstructive pulmonary disease congestive heart failure active post-discharge self-management reduce re-hospitalization rate .
DOC.brief_title: The Supporting Patient Activation Transition Home Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: Included patient transition home bridge telephone-call patient activation coach two day post-discharge . The patient thereafter get motivational interviewing session patient activation coach goal patient motivate knowledge , skill confidence need manage four main activity area : 1 ) medication management ; 2 ) adhere care plan/ follow-up visit accord discharge plan ; 3 ) recognize indication ( symptoms/signs ) condition worsen respond ; 4 ) contact manage relations/encounters health care provider . Patients control group receive standard care , i.e . discharge follow-up normal procedure . The investigator use randomization permute block 10 intervention patient 10 control patient include . To test hypothesis re-hospitalizations rate 15 % low intervention group compare control group 242 patient ( 121 per group ) need power 80 % level significance set 5 % use two-sided chi-square .
